channel.title: Milwaukee on Brian Barkley's website
channel.description: Recent content in Milwaukee on Brian Barkley's website

item.title: Announcing the WeCountCOVID19.com Survey (Part 1)
item.description: I am excited to announce that the WeCountCOVID19.com survey is live! I am so excited to describe the WeCountCOVID19.com survey in detail, and to ask you to use it. I’m so excited for this, in fact, that I’m writing a blog post for the first time in more than a year! In this time, I’ve been volunteering lots of my time as a co-founding member and the Communications Lead at Code for Milwaukee, which is Wisconsin’s only Code for America brigade, aiming to enhance the delivery of public services to help make Milwaukee a safer, healthier, and more fun place to live.

item.title: Hack & Tell: Data Science in MKE
item.description: This website is now live! I spent several hours at Rokkincat’s Hack & Tell reading more about blogdown and netflify, and toying with a few settings. One big thing that I’ve been wanting to do is start a catalogue of the data science activities in Milwaukee. There is a lot of beauty in Milwaukee, and also a lot of need. The MKE community also has many talented professions working Saturdays on side projects and hobbies that make Milwaukee a better place.
